Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back SAVE UP TO $7000 PER COUPLE European River Cruises Emerald River Cruises Super Earlybird Offers - Summer Cruise Savings Overview Terms & Conditions For the cruise that is right for you, please ask your consultant for availability and pricing details. Super Earlybird Offers - Summer Cruise Savings Save up to $3,500 per person* - Book and pay in full on selected European river cruise tours in July and August 2026 and save up to $3,500pp*! Must book and pay in full within 10 months prior to departure. Limited availability until sold out. Super Earlybird Offers Save up to $2,500 per person* - Book and pay in full on selected European river cruise tours during all months expect July and August 2026 and save up to $2,500pp*! Must book and pay in full within 10 months prior to departure. Limited availability until sold out. Earlybird Offers Save up to $1,000 per person* - Book and pay deposit by 7 November, 2025 prior to departure on selected European river cruise tours and save up to $1,000pp*! View more View less SAVE UP TO $7000 PER COUPLE Enquire now Sale Period : 7 Nov 25 unless sold out prior Terms & Conditions All cruise packages are based on Twin share, inside cabin and costs are per person. Availability is current as at 1 Sep 25 and deals are available until date shown or until sold out. Space is strictly limited and is subject to availability at time of booking. On board credit where shown is per cabin & must be spent on board and is not refundable in cash. All passengers are bound by the individual cruise lines terms & conditions, please ask your consultant for a full copy. Current Deals must be paid in full at time of booking or deposit dates as shown. All passengers must have a valid passport with more than 6 months validity at the end of their holiday. Travel insurance should be taken out at time of booking to cover in the event of any unforeseen cancellation. Included airfares are based on special non refundable economy fares, ground transfers are not included unless specified, any hotels included are on a room only basis unless specified. Hotels in certain destinations in Europe, USA and Asia may require local tourist taxes or resort fees payable at check in, We aim to give an indication of these where possible, but unfortunately you cannot pre pay this aspect of the hotel rate and must settle at check in. ESTA Visas are required for Itineraries visiting USA ,Canada, India, China, Vietnam, Schengen states & Sri Lanka. Visa costs are not included. Passports must be valid at least 6 months after the end of your holiday, If travelling on a non NZ passport other visas + NZ re-entry permits may also be required, please check with applicable embassy. Passport validity, Visas, Vaccinations and health requirements are the responsibility of the passengers. Individual cruise line T&C will apply based on the cruise line booked. 2026 Super Earlybird Offer Terms & Conditions Super Earlybirds – Summer Cruise Savings 2026: Save up to $3,500 per person twin share based on 15 Day Splendours of Europe river cruise (EWCR) July sailing in a D Category Stateroom. To receive Super Earlybird offers. Cruise must be paid in full 10 months prior to departure. Once sold out or if full payment is not received the full fare will apply. Offer is combinable with one voucher per person including Welcome Home Voucher, Information Session Voucher or Loyalty benefits. Super Earlybirds 2026: Save up to $2,500 per person twin share based on 15 Day Splendours of Europe river cruise (EWCR) November sailing in an E Category Stateroom. To receive Super Earlybird offers, cruise must be paid in full 10 months prior to departure. Once sold out or if full payment is not received full fare will apply. Offer is combinable with one voucher per person including Welcome Home Voucher, Information Session Voucher or Loyalty benefits. Earlybirds 2026: Save up to $1,000 per person twin share is based on 15 Day Splendours of Europe river cruise (EWCR) November sailing in an E Category Stateroom. To receive Earlybird offers, cruise must be booked and deposited by 7 November, 2025. Once sold out or if the full payment is not received the full fare will apply. Offer is combinable with one voucher per person including Welcome Home Voucher, Information Session Voucher or Loyalty benefits. Savings and offers: to secure offers & cabin/seat a non-refundable booking deposit of $1,000 per person per cruise/tour must be paid within 30 days of making a booking. Information and availability correct at 18/08/25 and are subject to change. Emerald Cruises (a division of Scenic Tour Pty Ltd). NZN 9 249 038 484 117.
